it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.commons

  • Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.commons used by it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.client 
    Class and Description
    EventMessage
    The message sent by the broker to the clients
    RequestMessage
    Defines the object that is sent through the socket from the client to the server.
    ResponseMessage
    Is the class of the object that the server sends to the client to communicate the outcome of the command it send, together with a message when needed (for example: send cause of negative outcome, result of query)
    SubscriberInterface
    The interface with the method needed from the broker to send a message to the subscriber (client)
  • Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.commons used by it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.commons 
    Class and Description
    CommunicationType
    Simple enumeration to distinguish between the sockets and rmi communication type
    Communicator
    Interface for the exchanging serializable objects
    EventMessage
    The message sent by the broker to the clients
    EventMessage.EventType
    simple enumeration differentiating the type of event
    RequestType
    Simple enumeration with the different kinds of requests a client can send
    ResponseMessage
    Is the class of the object that the server sends to the client to communicate the outcome of the command it send, together with a message when needed (for example: send cause of negative outcome, result of query)
    SubscriberInterface
    The interface with the method needed from the broker to send a message to the subscriber (client)

    Class and Description
    BrokerInterface
    Simple broker interface we export to provide a way for the client to subscribe to a game and receive its updates

    Simple enumeration to distinguish between the sockets and rmi communication type

    The interface on which the client calls the remote methods on the GamesManager

    Defines the object that is sent through the socket from the client to the server.

    Is the class of the object that the server sends to the client to communicate the outcome of the command it send, together with a message when needed (for example: send cause of negative outcome, result of query)
